channel.title: |pi| Adding more dialog help?

item.title: |pi| Adding more dialog help?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Just change c.nextChat =

case 62: sendStatement("This is your first time playing, welcome to TP2006!"); c.nextChat = 63; break;

case 63: sendStatement("Your message here"); c.nextChat = 0; break;

Read full topic

item.title: |pi| Adding more dialog help?
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

Ok, i am making it so when you first login, it says alot of information abotu the server, so far there’s this
case 62:
sendStatement(“This is your first time playing, welcome to TP2006!”);
c.nextChat = 0;
break;

How can you add more dialog after “click here to continue”

Read full topic
